title: Chris Pratt debuts his fit new look as he's seen for the first time on set of new movie, Ghost Draft
text:
He's spent the past few months kicking up his intense health and fitness regime in preparation for his new starring role in Ghost Draft.

And Chris Pratt was seen for the first time on set on Monday filming in Atlanta, Georgia.

The 40-year-old newlywed was dressed in a casual ensemble as he held up his rifle for the scene.

Hard work paid off! Chris Pratt showcased his fit new look on Monday when he was seen on set of his new movie, Ghost Draft, in Atlanta, Georgia

Chris opted for a dark navy polo shirt and loose fitting trousers for the action flick.

His hair was appeared ruffled and slightly sweaty with stubble to match the rugged look.

The actor was joined by his co-star and the pair appeared to be bonding before the director called 'action.'

Riffle in hand: His hair was appeared ruffled and slightly sweaty with stubble to match the rugged look

Preparations: He's spent the past few months kicking up his intense health and fitness regime in preparation for his new starring role in Ghost Draft

Chris has spent the past few months working hard at the gym to hone his figure for the upcoming movie.

He took to his Instagram Stories back in August where he confessed he had already dropped 12 pounds but still had 'ways to go' and 'a lot of work to do.'

He held up a giant jug of water, which he said was filled with electrolytes and amino acids.

He said: 'If you're like me, and you're wondering how you can just shed some weight, water. Start there.

Tips and tricks: Chris has spent the past few months working hard at the gym to shred his figure for the upcoming movie

Puts in the hard yards: Chris has previously showcased an impressive transformation as part of roles

'You don't have to work out super hard. See, I'm just walking on a treadmill. Water, water, water. Pee three times by 10am.'

The Jurassic World star then gave his followers a call-to-action: 'I'm gonna be documenting my weight loss. I was inspired by my brother Cully, who's shed a ton of weight and is looking real good right now.

'He's motivated me. So, I'm gonna motivate you, and we're gonna get through this together, alright? Send me posts with you drinking water and sweating.'

The premise for Chris' new movie reads: 'The fate of a futuristic war rests upon one man's abilities to confront the ghosts of his past.'

'Humanity is losing to an alien invasion, so to fight back, scientists develop a way to draft soldiers from the past to fight the war,' according to IMDb.
description: Chris Pratt showcased his fit new look on Monday when he was seen on set of his new movie, Ghost Draft, in Atlanta, Georgia.
